body: Wtf , If u gonna put NTR , make a separate series or something . Why just do a un-necessary Ntr in mid-page to dirty up other clean pages.

I get not liking ntr but it's literally not real pure fiction, its not something that happens like how about you just jack off and move on? btw I used to think ntr was shit but it depends on the thing but most of the time I don't care
I'll hate NTR ever i dont like the komachi's part but the rest was good enough sooo take your favourite
